titleStmt.title: An Account of the tryal of Lord Mohun, for the murther of Mr. William Mountford (as to the manner and form thereof,) who was tryed in Westminster-Hall, the 13th of January, 1692, before the Right Honourable the Marquess of Carmarthen, Lord President of the Council, constituted lord high steward on that occasion.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Torn with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
